subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{Han compound|糸|alt1=糹|冬|ls=psc|c1=s|c2=p}} – the knot at the end of a cord.

# [[end]]; [[ending]]; [[termination]]
# to [[come]] to an [[end]]
# {{lb|zh|euphemistic}} to [[die]]; to [[reach]] the [[end]] of [[life]]
# [[entire]]; [[all]]
# [[eventually]]; [[finally]]
